title: Attitude Change Education Program Through Animal Behavior and Welfare MOOC

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Intensive education course for job seekers and university students to enhance awareness of animal welfare. Combines video learning and discussions using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate positive attitude changes in four animal welfare domains (general, cognitive, emotional, behavioral) with over 80% consistency
Learners can improve animal welfare issue analysis skills by over 70% through instructor video content
Learners can complete animal welfare action plans with over 90% accuracy after course completion
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
